message.body: Yes...can't see a size a size on them..say Neolite on bottom. They're dirty.
Omg. Brown vintage field boots are like the holy grail! I will be super lucky if they fit. Does she want to consign/eBay this stuff? It's nice!
I don't think they'll fit. I can't get my calf into them to see if the foot part fits & I think your legs are as big as mine. People didn't use to be th
is muscular. They're yours to do whatever you want with.
